text:
You could filter them by tags and add a "featured" tag of some sort on the blog posts

e.g:
```{% set related_posts = blog_recent_topic_posts(<http://module.blog|module.blog>, module.topic, 3 ) %}```

the reason why i've stayed away from using the DnD areas is due to this, the lack of responsiveness options.

If you want that kinda of control, you'll have to create your own module with the options built in.

e.g with options:

• Columns per row  < 768px
• Columns per row 768 - 990px
• Columns per row 990 - 1024px
• Columns per row 1024px +
Then apply your own classes and rules according to whatever's selected
